title: Create a basic assignment — ft3_assignment_skeleton
text: function create folder file contains basic assignment use flexTeaching3. meant used conjunction developing package  assignments; typically point `inst/ft3_pkg` folder source  assignments package developing.

title: Create a basic assignment — ft3_assignment_skeleton
code: ft3_assignment_skeleton(   target_dir,   title = "Example assignment",   format = c("html_document", "html_fragment", "pdf_document"),   ... )

title: Create a basic assignment — ft3_assignment_skeleton
text: target_dir directory contain assignments title Title assignment format One 'html_document', 'html_fragment', 'pdf_document' ... currently used.

title: Create a file name from flexTeaching parameters — ft3_create_filename
text: filename original file name assignment assignment reference id user id parameter seed seed parameter assignment_mode (logical) assignment mode? solutions (logical) Solutions requested? file_content Full content file ... potential parameters (currently used)

what: Set or get options for the `flexTeaching3.api` package — ft3_options
title: Set or get options for the `flexTeaching3.api` package — ft3_options
text: Set get options `flexTeaching3.api` package

title: Set or get options for the `flexTeaching3.api` package — ft3_options
Set or get options for the `flexTeaching3.api` package — ft3_options
text: ... Option names retrieve option values [key]=[value] pairs set options.

title: Set or get options for the `flexTeaching3.api` package — ft3_options
text: following options supported master_secret(character)  Master secret use generation seeds. NULL package loaded, random master seed generated (warning). scratch_dir(character)  Disk location use temporary space rendering. NULL, temporary directory used. cache_location(character)  Disk location save content cache. NULL, temporary directory used. assignments_pkg(character) Installed package use assignments. NULL, package used. assignments_dir(character) Directory use assignments. NULL, determined assignments_pkg. default_file_icon(character) Default icon use file downloads none specified. timezone(character) Default timezone use assignment restrictions. Empty string system time zone. lubridate_orders(character) Time/date orders use parsing date-times using lubridate package. default_category_name(character) name category place uncategorized assignments. errors_to_client(logical) Pass internal R error descriptions client interface? may pose security risk, may helpful debugging. force_callr(logical) Force use callr rendering documents, regardless assignment settings? May helpful debugging. auth_tokens(character) vector valid authentication tokens. length 0, authentication disabled.

what: Start the flexTeaching3 API using RestRserve — ft3_serve_api
title: Start the flexTeaching3 API using RestRserve — ft3_serve_api
text: function meant run script, interactive session. See file 'start_api.R' script included package.

title: Start the flexTeaching3 API using RestRserve — ft3_serve_api
code: ft3_serve_api(   cache_options = list(dir = ft3_options("cache_location"), destroy_on_finalize = TRUE),   assignments_pkg = ft3_options("assignments_pkg"),   assignments_dir = NULL,   http_port = 8080,   log_options = list(level = "off"),   ... )

title: Start the flexTeaching3 API using RestRserve — ft3_serve_api
text: cache_options List options passed cachem::disk_cache() assignments_pkg Package containing assignments assignments_dir Optional directory containing assignments; specified, inferred assignments_pkg. http_port Port start server log_options List options log, passed RestRserve::Logger$new() ... arguments passed RestRserve backend's start() method

title: Start the flexTeaching3 API using RestRserve — ft3_serve_api
text: result RestRserve backend's start() method
